title: Butter and Herb Mashed Potatoes (Puré con mantequilla y especias) - Idahoan Mashed Potatoes - Idahoan Foods LLC
description: El Butter and Herb Mashed Potatoes de Idahoan es un clásico en las mesas familiares, hechas con papas 100% naturales de Idaho® está perfectamente mezclado con mantequilla y especias.
sitename: Idahoan Mashed Potatoes - Idahoan Foods LLC
text:
El Butter and Herb Mashed Potatoes de Idahoan es un clásico en las mesas familiares, hechas con papas 100% naturales de Idaho® está perfectamente mezclado con mantequilla y especias.
Recetas
Sugerencias de proteínas
Detalles del producto
Instrucciones para preparación
Stove Top Preparation
- Add 2 cups of water to a medium sized sauce pan and heat water on high to a boil.
- Remove boiling water from heat and immediately stir in entire pouch of potatoes.
- Mix thoroughly using a fork to moisten all potatoes and let stand 1 minute.
- Stir well and serve.
Microwave Preparation
All microwaves vary and heating times may have to be adjusted.
- Measure 2 cups of water into a microwave safe bowl.
- Microwave on high for 4-5 minutes to heat water to a boil. CAUTION: Bowl and water will be very hot!
- Remove water from microwave and immediately add entire pouch of potatoes all at once, using a fork to moisten all potatoes and let stand 1 minute.
- Stir well and serve.
Información nutricional
Ingredientes
IDAHO® POTATOES, VEGETABLE OIL (COCONUT, SUNFLOWER), WHEY, SALT, BUTTERMILK POWDER, SUGAR, NONFAT DRY MILK, MONOGLYCERIDES, CALCIUM STEAROYL LACTYLATE, DRIED ONION, NATURAL FLAVORS, PARSLEY, BUTTER (CREAM, SALT), SPICE. FRESHNESS PRESERVED BY SODIUM ACID PYROPHOSPHATE, SODIUM BISULFITE, CITRIC ACID, AND MIXED TOCOPHEROLS.
CONTAINS: MILK.
GLUTEN FREE
